attributes.action: make sure that Christmas is not "downgraded".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A Government “think tank” recently declared that Christmas should be downgraded until other religious festivals are on an even public footing.
We are against this proposal as although we understand that Great Britain is a multi-cultural society, Christianity still remains our national religion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
